entry.Gold: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
entry.Silver: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
entry.Crystal: The color of the mysterious fluid secreted from its tail is predetermined for each SMEARGLE.
entry.RubySapphire: SMEARGLE marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.
entry.FireRed: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
entry.LeafGreen: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
entry.Emerald: A SMEARGLE marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
entry.HeartGold: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
entry.SoulSilver: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
entry.X: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
entry.Y: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
entry.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.
entry.Sun: The unique creations produced by each Smeargle are painted using the fluid that oozes from its tail. This is how it marks its territory.
entry.Moon: It draws symbols all over the place to mark its territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls are covered in graffiti.
